column4: guys have a problem - is there a way i could force update manager to re-download downloaded but not installed packages?
why that ? can try apt-get clean and re- do then
cause i cant install latest updates. i remember my laptop froze in the middle. i had to reboot. then continued downloading. now it wont install any update. tells me error on every package
in the middle of a dist-upgrade ?
ah, I see, open a terminal for some tries
sudo apt-get update                       ,paste the error if any
what did you want to install ?
nothing special. just the ubuntu updates.
